feed.title: North Mountain (Cape Breton) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Mountain (Cape Breton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 12:00 PM AST Friday 20 January 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero except low minus 3 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm over the Highlands. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Temperature steady near zero except low minus 3 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 20 January 2023
